questions.body: In what children's game are participants chased by someone designated "It"?
On a radio, stations are changed by using what control?
Which state in the United States is largest by area?
What is Aurora Borealis commonly known as?
answers: a Game of Thrones main character

questions.body: Galileo was an Italian astronomer who
answers: discovered that the movement of pendulum produces a regular time measurement

questions.body: Exposure to sunlight helps a person improve his health because
answers: the infrared light kills bacteria in the body
the pigment cells in the skin get stimulated and produce a healthy tan
the ultraviolet rays convert skin oil into Vitamin D

questions.body: Sir Thomas Fearnley Cup is awarded to
answers: a club or a local sport association for remarkable achievements
amateur athlete, not necessarily an Olympian
National Olympic Committee for outstanding work

questions.body: When did Margaret Thatcher became the first female Prime Minister of Britain?
When is the International Workers' Day?
When did China test their first atomic device?
